title: Modern War Underscore
description: Seven tracks (+2 loops derived from them), that'll blow your socks off.
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=QfjWM3ylSyo

Nine tracks (7 tracks + 2 loops derived from them), that range from aggressively pumping to gently flowing and will be ideal for anything action-orientated, especially if set in the Middle-East.

Cues:
1. Across No Man's Land - Imagine a journey to the battlefield.
2. LZ Hot / Engage - Time to grab a gun and do some war.
3. Nighttime Infiltration - This is when you sneak in and do that silent stuff.
4. Welcome to No Man's Land - Epic theme with a female voice wailing on top of strings, brass percussion and a collection of ethnic instruments.
5. Dawn - Soft pad, a touch of threat and some tremolos.

Loops:
1. Generic Menu LOOP - Good music for a Main Menu, or a generic, "epic" background when one's needed. Not derived from any Cue.
2. Nighttime Infiltration LOOP - about from 05:18 on Youtube and 44 seconds onwards packed to a loop. Derived from Cue 'Nighttime Infiltration'.
3. Dawn LOOP - No fade out. Derived from Cue 'Dawn'.
4. Dawn Soft LOOP - Softer version with some extras. This was not derived from any other track, more like an alternate version of track 'Dawn'.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio tracks: 9
Number of Audio Cues: 9
Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs
Does music\audio loop: Yes/No (See description)
How many sound FX: 0
How many minutes of audio provided: 15 (from which 1.8 minutes is derived from other tracks in this collection)
Intended Platform: All
Platforms Tested: Windows
Documentation Included: No
